item.title: Founder
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
<!-- wp:maysternya/headline-subline {"pretitle":"MAIN PAGE/ABOUT US","headline":"THE
FOUNDER","headlineTag":"h1","alignment":"left","size":"large"} /-->
<!-- wp:maysternya/text-image {"title":"LEONID SADOVSKY","subtitle":"Founder & Artistic Director","content":"Leonid Sadovsky is a Ukrainian theater director, teacher, and the visionary behind MAYSTERNYA 55. Born in Kharkiv in 1965, he dedicated his life to creating authentic, emotionally powerful theater that speaks to the human condition.

After graduating from the Kharkiv National University of Arts in 1989, Sadovsky worked in various state theaters before founding MAYSTERNYA 55 in 2006. His vision was to create an independent space where artists could explore, experiment, and grow without the constraints of traditional theater institutions.","imagePosition":"right"} /-->
<!-- wp:maysternya/section-separator {"title":"ARTISTIC VISION","alignment":"center"} /-->
<!-- wp:maysternya/text-block {"content":""Theater is not simply entertainment—it is a laboratory for examining the human soul. In our work, we seek not to distract audiences from their lives, but to illuminate the depths of human experience. Every performance is an experiment in truth."

— Leonid Sadovsky","columns":1,"width":"full","alignment":"center"} /-->
<!-- wp:maysternya/text-image {"title":"METHODOLOGY","content":"Sadovsky's approach combines the psychological depth of Stanislavski with physical theater techniques from European masters. His training methodology emphasizes:

• Ensemble work and collective creation
• Physical expressiveness as the foundation of performance
• Deep emotional authenticity
• Rigorous text analysis and character work
• Integration of voice, body, and mind","imagePosition":"left"} /-->
<!-- wp:maysternya/image-grid {"gap":"medium"} /-->
<!-- wp:maysternya/section-separator {"title":"ACHIEVEMENTS","alignment":"center"} /-->
<!-- wp:maysternya/text-block {"content":"Under Sadovsky's leadership, MAYSTERNYA 55 has:

• Produced over 30 theatrical works
• Toured to festivals in Italy, Germany, Poland, and beyond
• Trained over 200 young artists through the Summer Theatre Academy
• Established international partnerships with leading theater organizations
• Received numerous awards for artistic excellence","columns":1,"width":"full","alignment":"left"} /-->
<!-- wp:maysternya/banner {"title":"LEARN
MORE","subtitle":"Discover our company's journey","titleTag":"h2","showCta":true,"ctaText":"OUR HISTORY","ctaUrl":"/history","ctaStyle":"outline","height":"short","contentAlignment":"center"} /-->

item.title: Manifesto
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
<!-- wp:maysternya/headline-subline {"pretitle":"MAIN PAGE/ABOUT US","headline":"OUR
MANIFESTO","headlineTag":"h1","alignment":"left","size":"large"} /-->
<!-- wp:maysternya/text-block {"content":"We believe in theater as a sacred space where humans gather to witness truth.","columns":1,"width":"full","alignment":"center"} /-->
<!-- wp:maysternya/section-separator {"title":"I","alignment":"center"} /-->
<!-- wp:maysternya/text-block {"content":"Theater is not entertainment. It is not escape. It is confrontation—with ourselves, with each other, with the questions that haunt us in the dark hours of the night.

We make theater to illuminate, not to distract. To challenge, not to comfort. To connect, not to divide.","columns":1,"width":"full","alignment":"left"} /-->
<!-- wp:maysternya/section-separator {"title":"II","alignment":"center"} /-->
<!-- wp:maysternya/text-block {"content":"The actor is not a vessel for someone else's words. The actor is an artist whose body, voice, and soul become the medium through which truth is revealed.

We train relentlessly. We question constantly. We fail repeatedly. And through this process, we discover what it means to be fully, authentically human on stage.","columns":1,"width":"full","alignment":"left"} /-->
<!-- wp:maysternya/section-separator {"title":"III","alignment":"center"} /-->
<!-- wp:maysternya/text-block {"content":"The ensemble is greater than any individual. When artists unite in service of a shared vision, they create something that transcends what any person could achieve alone.

We are a family. We support each other. We challenge each other. We grow together.","columns":1,"width":"full","alignment":"left"} /-->
<!-- wp:maysternya/section-separator {"title":"IV","alignment":"center"} /-->
<!-- wp:maysternya/text-block {"content":"Theater must speak to its time. The classics endure not because they are museum pieces, but because they contain truths that resonate across centuries.

We honor tradition by reinventing it. We respect the past by making it present. We serve the playwright by bringing their vision to life for contemporary audiences.","columns":1,"width":"full","alignment":"left"} /-->
<!-- wp:maysternya/section-separator {"title":"V","alignment":"center"} /-->
<!-- wp:maysternya/text-block {"content":"Independence is essential. We answer to no institution, no ideology, no commercial interest—only to our artistic conscience and our audience.

This freedom comes with responsibility. We must earn the trust of those who support us by creating work of uncompromising quality and integrity.","columns":1,"width":"full","alignment":"left"} /-->
<!-- wp:maysternya/section-separator {"title":"VI","alignment":"center"} /-->
<!-- wp:maysternya/text-block {"content":"Education is continuation. We are committed to passing on what we have learned to the next generation of theater artists.

Every master was once a student. Every student carries the seeds of mastery. The chain must not be broken.","columns":1,"width":"full","alignment":"left"} /-->
<!-- wp:maysternya/banner {"title":"THIS IS
MAYSTERNYA
55","titleTag":"h2","showCta":true,"ctaText":"JOIN US","ctaUrl":"/support-us","ctaStyle":"outline","height":"short","contentAlignment":"center"} /-->

item.title: History
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
<!-- wp:maysternya/headline-subline {"pretitle":"MAIN PAGE/HISTORY","headline":"OUR
HISTORY","headlineTag":"h1","alignment":"left","size":"large"} /-->
<!-- wp:maysternya/section-separator {"title":"2006—2011","subtitle":"THE BEGINNING","alignment":"left"} /-->
<!-- wp:maysternya/text-image {"title":"FOUNDATION YEARS","content":"In 2006, director Leonid Sadovsky founded MAYSTERNYA 55 as an experimental theater studio in Kharkiv. The company began as a small group of dedicated actors and students who shared a vision of creating authentic, emotionally powerful theater.

During these formative years, the ensemble developed its unique methodology, combining elements of psychological realism with physical theater techniques.","imagePosition":"right"} /-->
<!-- wp:maysternya/section-separator {"title":"2011—2016","subtitle":"GROWTH & RECOGNITION","alignment":"left"} /-->
<!-- wp:maysternya/text-image {"title":"EXPANDING HORIZONS","content":"The second chapter of our history saw MAYSTERNYA 55 grow from a local phenomenon to a nationally recognized theater company. We expanded our repertoire, took on more ambitious productions, and began participating in national and international festivals.

This period marked our first international collaborations, including partnerships with theater companies in Poland, Germany, and Italy.","imagePosition":"left"} /-->
<!-- wp:maysternya/section-separator {"title":"2016—2020","subtitle":"INTERNATIONAL PRESENCE","alignment":"left"} /-->
<!-- wp:maysternya/text-image {"title":"GOING GLOBAL","content":"MAYSTERNYA 55 established itself as a significant voice in international theater. We participated in prestigious festivals across Europe, including FLIPT (Italy), Zukunft/st (Germany), and numerous Ukrainian national events.

Our educational programs expanded significantly during this period with the Summer Theatre Academy.","imagePosition":"right"} /-->
<!-- wp:maysternya/section-separator {"title":"2020—2024","subtitle":"RESILIENCE & RENEWAL","alignment":"left"} /-->
<!-- wp:maysternya/text-image {"title":"THEATRE IN TIMES OF CHANGE","content":"The recent years have tested our resilience like never before. The global pandemic and the war in Ukraine presented unprecedented challenges, but our commitment to theater remained unwavering.

We adapted to new realities, creating online performances, organizing benefit events, and continuing to train the next generation of theater artists.","imagePosition":"left"} /-->
<!-- wp:maysternya/banner {"title":"THE STORY
CONTINUES...","titleTag":"h2","showCta":true,"ctaText":"SUPPORT OUR JOURNEY","ctaUrl":"/support-us","ctaStyle":"outline","height":"short","contentAlignment":"center"} /-->
